text: The 18th Secretariat of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union was elected by the 18th Central Committee in the aftermath of the 18th Congress, held in 1939. ==List of members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! scope="col" |Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration ! scope="col" style="width:30em;" | Note |- ! scope="row" | (1878–1953) | 22 April 1939 | 14 October 1952 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1895–1971) | 22 April 1939 | 18 March 1946 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1905–1950) | 18 March 1946 | 28 January 1949 | | align="left" | The official explanation for his removal was that he was being "reassigned". |- ! scope="row" | (1896–1948) | 22 April 1939 | 31 August 1947 | | align="left" | Died in office of natural causes. |- ! rowspan="2" scope="row" | (1902–1988) | 22 April 1939 | 6 May 1946 | | align="left" | Removed on Stalin's orders. |- | 1 July 1948 | 14 October 1952 | | align="left" | Reelected to the Secretariat at Stalin's proposal. |- ! scope="row" | (1894–1971) | 16 December 1949 | 14 October 1952 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1908–1989) | 5 June 1946 | 24 May 1947 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1902–1984) | 1 July 1948 | 14 October 1952 | | — |- ! scope="row" | Georgy Popov (1906–1968) | 18 March 1946 | 16 December 1949 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1901–1945) | 5 May 1941 | 10 May 1945 | | align="left" | Elected to the Secretariat at the 6th Plenary Session, but died of natural causes during his tenure. |- ! scope="row" | (1902–1982) | 24 May 1947 | 14 October 1952 | | — |} Category:Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union members
